data.title: Great place!
data.text: Great location for trailing and walking. We enjoy the great view while walking. There is blue trail and orange trail. We had a great day!

data.title: Pretty Park along a stream, Shared space wtih the Disc Golf and Orange trail walking/riding
data.text: For walking and riding this is a very nice park. If you play Disc Golf (Frisbee) I suspect this is great.   The Orange Trail paved walkway and the Disc Golf course share the space along a stream so you can get a good long walk if you loop around.  Great place to walk a dog and enjoy the weather.
